statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_data_access_audit;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE accessed_data_type = 'Transaction';
SELECT audit_id, user_id FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data_access_audit ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM blockchain_data_access_audit GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT accessed_data_type, access_time FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT accessed_data_type FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY accessed_data_type;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM blockchain_data_access_audit GROUP BY user_id HAVING access_count > 5;
SELECT audit_id, query_executed FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE accessed_data_type LIKE '%blockchain%' ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, access_timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM user_audit_log WHERE action = 'read' ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
SELECT query FROM blockchain_data WHERE access_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM blockchain_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM blockchain_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, action FROM user_audit_log WHERE action = 'delete' ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE query LIKE '%important%' AND access_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM access_timestamp)) AS avg_seconds FROM blockchain_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_access;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM user_access ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_type FROM user_access WHERE access_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, access_type, access_time FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, access_type FROM user_access ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_type, event_time FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 2 AND event_type = 'login'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY block_id DESC
SELECT user_id, max(access_time) FROM user_access GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM UserAccessLogs;
SELECT user_id, access_time, action FROM UserAccessLogs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT data_id, data_content, data_type FROM BlockchainData WHERE creator_id = 456 ORDER BY created_time DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM UserRoles;
SELECT * FROM UserAccessLogs
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM UserAccessLogs ORDER BY access_time DESC
SELECT Users.username, UserAccessLogs.action, UserRoles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserAccessLogs ON Users.user_id = UserAccessLogs.user_id JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_role = UserRoles.role_name
SELECT Users.username, Users.email, UserRoles.role_description FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_role = UserRoles.role_name WHERE Users.email LIKE '%@example.com%'

SELECT Users.username, BlockchainData.data_content, UserRoles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserAccessLogs ON Users.user_id = UserAccessLogs.user_id JOIN BlockchainData ON UserAccessLogs.blockchain_data_id = BlockchainData.data_id JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_role = UserRoles.role_name ORDER BY UserAccessLogs.access_time DESC
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time, query FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp, details FROM user_data_audit ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, query FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_data_audit WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT block_data->>'hash' AS block_hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 10;
